# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/images | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/images ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-images)

-  GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/images 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/images

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-images#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/images
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-images#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-images#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-images#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionImagesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionimageslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-images#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-images#Endpoints)

[`Create an image for a subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptionimages)Reserve an image asset to appear in the App Store, representing a subscription.[`Read subscription image information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionimages-_id_)Read details about a specific subscription image.[`List subscription images`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-images)List all images for a specific subscription.[`Read subscription image information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-subscriptionimages-_id_)Read details about a specific subscription image.[`Delete an subscription image`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-subscriptionimages-_id_)Delete the image asset that appears on the App Store listing that represents an subscription.
